edu.ucla.sspace.basis
Class AbstractBasisMapping<T,K>

java.lang.Object
  edu.ucla.sspace.basis.AbstractBasisMapping<T,K>
All Implemented Interfaces:
BasisMapping<T,K>, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
RelationBasedBasisMapping, StringBasisMapping, WordBasedBasisMapping, WordBasisMapping, WordOrderBasisMapping
public abstract class AbstractBasisMapping<T,K>
extends Object
implements BasisMapping<T,K>, Serializable

An abstract base class for BasisMappings that implements most of the required functionality. For any requested feature, the currently mapped dimension is returned upon request, or a new dimension is generated if the BasisMapping is not in read only mode.

All access to this BasisMapping is thread safe.

Author:
Keith Stevens
See Also:

getDimensionInternal

protected int getDimensionInternal(K key)
Returns an integer corresponding to key. If in read only mode, -1 is returned for unseen keys. Otherwise, unseen keys are assigned a new dimension.

getMapping

protected Map<K,Integer> getMapping()
Returns the internal mapping from keys to indices.

public int numDimensions()
Returns the number of dimensions currently represented in this basis mapping.

Specified by:
numDimensions in interface BasisMapping<T,K>

setReadOnly

public void setReadOnly(boolean readOnly)
Sets the read only state of the basis mapping. This is intended for when the basis mapping is needed to map to a known set of values, and any unknown values are left unmapped.

Specified by:
setReadOnly in interface BasisMapping<T,K>

isReadOnly

public boolean isReadOnly()
Returns true if the BasisMapping is read only, false otherwise.
